subject: Automobile Racing
Hungarian Grand Prix (Auto Race)
Monaco Grand Prix
Tires
lead_paragraph: Racing on the Hungaroring outside Budapest is physically draining on drivers and a challenge for engineers to set up the cars to deal with extreme heat and a narrow, twisting circuit.
snippet: Racing on the Hungaroring outside Budapest is physically draining on drivers and a challenge for engineers to set up the cars to deal with extreme heat and a narrow, twisting circuit.
